entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
